accessibility._instruction: Add the accessibility of the data for this software version.

applicationCategory._instruction: Add all categories to which this software version belongs.

authors._instruction: Add one or several authors (person or organization) that contributed to the production and publication of this software version.

copyright._instruction: Add the copyright of this software version.

custodians._instruction: Add one or several custodians (person or organization) that are responsible for this software version.

description._instruction: Enter a description (abstract) for this software version (max. 200 words; no references).

developers._instruction: Add one or several developers (person or organization) that contributed to the code implementation of this software version.

device.description: Add all hardware devices compatible with this software version.

digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this software version.

fullDocumentation._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of a full documentation of this software version.

fullName._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name (title) for this software version.

funding._instruction: Add all funding information of this software version.

hasAlternativeVersions._instruction: Add all software versions that can be used alternatively to this software version.

hasSupplementVersions._instruction: Add all software versions that supplement this software version.

homepage._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to the homepage of this software version.

inputFormat._instruction: Add the content types of all possible input formats for this software version.

isNewVersionOf._instruction: Add the content types of all possible output formats for this software version.

language._instruction: Add all languages supported by this software version.

license._instruction: Add the license of this software version.

operatingSystem._instruction: Add all operating systems supported by this software version.

otherContributions._instruction: Add the contributions for each involved person or organization going beyond being an author, custodian or developer of this software version.

outputFormat._instruction: Add the content types of all possible input formats for this software version.

programmingLanguage._instruction: Add all programming languages used for this software version.

relatedPublications._instruction: Add further publications besides the documentation (e.g. an original research article) providing the original context for the production of this software version.

releaseDate._instruction: Enter the date (actual or intended) of the first broadcast/publication of this software version.

repository._instruction: Add the file repository of this software version.

softwareFeature._instruction: Add all features of this software version.

softwareRequirement._instruction: Enter all requirements of this software version.

versionIdentifier._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this software version.

versionInnovations._instruction: Enter a short summary of the novelties/peculiarities of this software version.
